MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA2 postcode area of Paisley. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to repair an underground cable on St Ninians Crescent and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.44pm on Wednesday 21st October2020.
